original_text: And ye have done worse than your fathers; for, behold, ye walk every one after the imagination of his evil heart, that they may not hearken unto me:
korean_text: 너희가 너희 조상들보다 더욱 악을 행하였도다 보라 너희가 각기 악한 마음의 완악함을 따라 행하고 나에게 순종하지 아니하였으므로

sentences.original_text: And ye have done worse than your fathers;
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 너희 조상들보다 더 악하게 행하였고

sentences.original_text: for, behold, ye walk every one
after the imagination of his evil heart,
that they may not hearken unto me:
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 내게 듣지 않게 하려 함이라
